sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Free Healthcare Benefits Application Assistance Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Free Healthcare Benefits Application Assistance Act.

sections.heading: Healthcare program application assistance
sections.text: It is a Class C misdemeanor for any person, including an individual, firm, corporation, association, partnership, joint venture, or any employee or agent thereof, to charge another person for assisting in completing and submitting an application for enrol

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
